sentences.english: Is there a canopy in store for me?
sentences.chinese: 我的头上可有一片天篷为我准备著？

sentences.english: The canopy serves as protection from rain and heat.
sentences.chinese: 天篷为来自雨水和热量的保护。

sentences.english: The canopy bubble is reinforced with 2 layers of fiberglass on the inside.
sentences.chinese: 天篷泡沫是加强与2层玻璃的内部。

sentences.english: Dense Rainforest seen from Canopy Walkway.
sentences.chinese: 从天篷走道被见到的密集的雨林。

sentences.english: The place where they sat was shaded from the sun by green awnings.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐的地方有绿色的天篷遮阴。

sentences.english: There is a canopy over the entrance.
Toucans are found in South and Central America in the canopy layer of the rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 巨嘴鸟在雨林的天篷层的南方和中美洲被发现。

sentences.english: The sense of space and ease of vision is enhanced by the huge glass canopy .
sentences.chinese: 意义上的空间和易于理想是加强了巨大的玻璃天篷。

definition: to descend to the world (of immortals)
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
The Southern Heavenly Gates/a name for a mountain pass gate in several places
Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4] or Zhu Wuneng, Pigsy or Pig (in Journey to the West)
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
The Nine-Toothed Rake (weapon of Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4])
